Reviews.Title: Cheap But Risky
Reviews.Author: Tim D.
Reviews.Content: I bought these modulators based on the good reviews here.  The first one was to replace an existing modulator that I had that stopped working.From some of the reviews it's clear that some people are confused about what a cable video modulator is or does (but admittedly the title of this item "...RF Signal Modulator..." is misleading).Cable video modulators are fed a composite video source and are connected to the coaxial cable of an existing cable TV system.  The modulator is then set to modulate the composite input video onto a cable channel that you can tune in on any TV hooked to the cable system.  In other words, you create your own cable TV channel on your coaxial cable.I've run several different model digital video modulators for years (including Netmedia Triple Play modulators and Sunrise agile modulators to name just a couple I have in service currently).  I use them to broadcast security cameras and DVRs that are located in different buildings on my property over my cable so I can watch the cameras on any of my TVs.So I'm already modulating several different channels on the system that I'm adding the Nyrius modulators to.I was attracted by the price of these modulators - they're half the price of other name-brand (i.e. Channel Plus and Netmedia) single channel modulators.The first thing I noticed about the Nyrius modulator is that it doesn't seem to have a very strong signal output.  That means they require an amplifier on the output for them to work on my system at all.  (That may be due in part to the other video channels I'm modulating on that cable too - I don't know.)After initially buying one of these modulators and using it, I later bought two more and put one of them into use (with an amplifier on the output).However, not long after hooking up the second modulator I found that the signal output would periodically degrade to the point of being un-viewable.  I ran it for a while before swapping it with the third.  When that worked OK I returned the other modulator as defective.  But within a week the other modulator was manifesting the same problem.  Unfortunately by that time my 30 days to return the item had come and gone, so I was stuck with it.The first modulator is still running OK (with its weak signal output however).  But that means that 2 out of 3 modulators I got were apparently defective.Maybe I was just unlucky, or maybe these modulators aren't compatible with the other modulators I've got running on my coax, but based on the weak signal and modulation problems I experienced I can't recommend these modulators, despite the price.

Reviews.Title: Well-designed, channel-selectable RF modulator for NTSC TV
Reviews.Author: Lee by the Sea
Reviews.Content: An "RF modulator for NTSC television" takes analog video and sound signals and puts them onto a television channel in the old North American analog signal format.  That's useful even in the digital television era since many DTV sets accept them.  With a modulator you can take the video and sound from (for example) a Roku box, give it a special channel, and add it to your off-the-air DTV signals.  Most RF modulators will only put signals on channel 3 or 4 but you may need more flexibility; Nyrius provides that flexibility.  It puts your signal on any channel from 14 to 69 with the push of a button.  (It also can create the "CATV" channels.)  A display shows you the channel.  Be sure to read the mini-manual that comes with the Nyrius; mine was preset to the "CATV" channels, so I had to switch it to 14-69 before my TV could see the signal.  (Making that change may be the only time you will use its power switch.) Conveniently, the Nyrius has a built-in signal combiner; just put the off-the-air signal into the input F-connector and take the combined signal from the output connector.  While the Nyrius includes a left and right audio input, I suspect it combines those sound signals into NTSC mono audio since the manual says nothing about stereo.  It uses a separate small 12-volt, 250 mA plug-in power supply.  I tested my Nyrius from channel 14 through 83; picture and sound were fine on all channels.  Altogether, a solid product at a good price.

Reviews.Title: Security cam and over the air signal integration.
Reviews.Author: Peter Z.
Reviews.Content: Worked as described. I used it to combine  feed  from a security DVR with 4 cameras  to an over the air feed  in my house. Device comes pre-setup to a cable tv mode, but instructions to change in to the over the air mode are simple and in the included manual. I had to find a channel with the least interference to get a clear picture which in my area happened to be 60. I can see this device be used for other  applications, but if you work from home, and  looking to see security feed on your existing tv, this should do the trick.

Reviews.Title: Works great!  Just what I needed.
Reviews.Author: jeff
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a way to share the video out of my dish network hopper receiver to another TV in the house.  My old dish receiver had this feature built in, but not the new ones.  I was able to use the Nyrius NRFM100 Universal Channel RF Signal Modulator Audio/Video Converter with UHF/CATV Mode for satellite/cable TV set-top-box, DVD, surveillance camera to take the composite video out and modulate it onto the TV channel of my choice to avoid interference.  I had to try a few different channels before I got the best picture.  Sure, its not HD, but I knew it wouldn't be.  But the picture quality is good and nobody has complained.  I would definitely recommend this and have thought about getting a second one for the output of my appletv so I can share it to another TV.  Great product and I hope lasts a long time.

Reviews.Title: Nyrius NRFM100 Universal Channel RF Signal Modulator
Reviews.Author: Dave F.
Reviews.Content: I bought this signal modulator to replace an old Radio Shack modulator that was impacted by a lightening strike at my house.  With the ability to modulate over the low as well as the high channels, this was an excellent choice from a price and performance standpoint.  With many plug-in devices allowing only channel 3 or 4 interfaces, that problem is gone with this Nyrius model.  I used this modulator to send my DirecTV signal from a media room to a bedroom down the hall and used an Infrared to IR transmitter to control the DirecTV receiver in the media room.  Take the DirecTV controller to bed, tune into channel 17, and my guests have full DirecTV to go to sleep by!  Great product, excellent signal, and great price.

Reviews.Title: Great buy!
Reviews.Author: rdr80
Reviews.Content: Well built! Worked perfectly right out of the box. Connect the cables, turn it on, pick a channel. Nothing to it. Highly recommended!

Reviews.Title: Redistribute TV
Reviews.Author: Ken Carrington
Reviews.Content: I use to send satellite channels to rarely used bedrooms, avoiding monthly charges for boxes. Works great. Easy to set up.

Reviews.Title: RF Modulator
Reviews.Author: Eric A. Ellison
Reviews.Content: We added a TV to the room where my wife uses her treadmill.  Although the TV receives over-the air HD local channels. she wanted to watch stations that are only available on cable or satellite.  This device allows her to select a channel she wants to watch by turning on the receiver in nearby room and tuning the RF Modulator to channel 125.  She then sets the TV in her "treadmill room" to 125 and she receives the programming that she wanted to watch.

Reviews.Title: I like this product.
Reviews.Author: Terence Hinds
Reviews.Content: I bought this product to obtain signal to another tv in the house. Connection was easy and good reception. However, signal was even better using a 10 decibel signal booster.

Reviews.Title: Great Value
Reviews.Author: TLengr
Reviews.Content: This product performs very well for me. I used it to convert an A/V signal to a cable channel (#93) and send it over coax to an older TV. It works perfectly. I don't think you can beat the price.

Reviews.Title: Clear Image
Reviews.Author: Patrick Riley
Reviews.Content: I know have 3 of these in operation.  2 with amplifiers for long cable runs and 1 without.  Signal quality is vastly improved over other modulators I tried that use only channel 3 or 4.

Reviews.Title: Extremely Cool - Nyrius - Please make a hi-def version of this!
Reviews.Author: Tony Dee
Reviews.Content: I take the composite video and audio out of my cable box/dvr and put it into this, set it to channel 77 and insert into a distribution amp/splitter.  Now I can tune channel 77 on ANY TV in the house and get the cable box/DVR - Whole room DVR!  I have a second one of these which I take the composite video and audio from a Roku, set that one to channel 79 so now I have the Roku on all of the TV's in my house on channel 79!What makes this cool is the ability to modulate to pretty much any TV channel you have that may be unused on your system - not limited to channel 3 or 4 like almost all of the other RF modulators out there.All the bad reviews I read on this seemed to be from people that really didn't know what this product was for, including one guy who expected this to transmit a TV signal over the air to other TV's in his house.  Its not a transmitter or a poor man's TV station.Nyrius,  if you are reading this, PLEASE make a hi-definition version of this product.  I would love to distribute the high def feeds from these devices and others.  The only hi-def modulators I have seen cost several hundred dollars, and I'm not quite ready to spend that much for hi def, but I will wait for you if you decide to make a hi-def model.WELL DONE NYRIUS!

Reviews.Title: Nyfty Nyrius
Reviews.Author: My Eye Soose
Reviews.Content: Nifty device met expectations just fine.  Hooked up to output from television to route to secondary television in kitchen--locked onto program on primary television.

Reviews.Title: Just what I needed!
Reviews.Author: Doug Duvigneaud
Reviews.Content: This item replaced a Radio Shack product that failed. It allows me to select the channel I wish to broadcast on and doesn't limit me to channel 3 or channel 4. I recommend it highly.

Reviews.Title: Eliminated my signal interference problems
Reviews.Author: Casey Allman
Reviews.Content: The product arrived in a timely manner as was very easy to install. I used to have a basic modulator that only gave me the option of channel 3 or 4. My problem was that I have a cable box that also only gives me the option of channel 3 or 4. The two channels would always interfere with each other and both would be "static-y". With this product my signal interference problem is eliminated. I left the cable box on channel 3 and set the new NRFM100 to channel 14 and both channels were clear. It works!

Reviews.Title: that like me.
Reviews.Author: jason castro
Reviews.Content: Is a eficent tranformer if frecuenci and its work perfectli. Now i see mi security cams in all my tv's.

Reviews.Title: VG Product
Reviews.Author: TheGMan
Reviews.Content: I am using this device to transmit the video matrix signal from my security DVR to the cable TV system in the building, so the  DVR video can be viewed from any TV tuned to a specific channel... it's working very well for this after some tweaking of the settings.  When I connected it and set it to 'cable', the signal was blurry and it caused some interference with other channels.  Setting it to 'air' and using a "beat" signal (this is a little involved) allowed it to broadcast cleanly on my cable and not cause interference.  Currently, I'm using it on air Ch22 so it picks up on cable Ch75, and it's working fine.  If you're a little techie-oriented, this will do you well... Since I'm using this in a specialized environment on a fairly large cable system, I had to play around with it.  On a more basic system, it may work without tweaking, I'm not sure.

Reviews.Title: Works great
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Easy hookup, easy setup, works exactly as advertised. Now enjoying DVR output on any TV in the house. Very cost effective solution.

Reviews.Title: A good fit for me
Reviews.Author: Harold Bluetooth "Hal"
Reviews.Content: Much easier to set the channel than the single button press pause ... thing I already have. x  y  z

Reviews.Title: Works Great!
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: Replaced a 4 channel Cable Vision Modulator with this 1 channel modulator and the quality is supurb for SD RF modulation!

Reviews.Title: Good Deal
Reviews.Author: El Malo
Reviews.Content: Excellent performance. I hooked this up per instructions and it worked the first time. I'm able to see cameras in a programmed tv channel in any tv in the house. What more can I ask of it and you can't beat the price.

Reviews.Title: works well for video monitoring on TV
Reviews.Author: C-Simpson
Reviews.Content: product woks well for simple tv monitoring of video. i purchased in hopes of setting up a single video monitor on a specific channel. this did not work i now use it through a DVR and it works well.

Reviews.Title: Modulator works great
Reviews.Author: rfergu1039
Reviews.Content: This modulator allows you to transmit a signal on any of a great many channels for viewing.  This flexibility allows you to have more than one signal broadcasting on a home network.  I am very impressed with this unit.

Reviews.Title: Good value
Reviews.Author: mobile_traveler
Reviews.Content: Installed the product with no problem.  Have long cable run (about 100') and had to use 10dB signal amp to get the signal to be clear on my distribution system.

Reviews.Title: Poor picture quality
Reviews.Author: Eric Schurr
Reviews.Content: I bought this unit to replace a modulator I had from Cable Plus that stopped working after 10 years.  I hooked this up and was very disappointed by the poor picture quality.  It was unwatchable.  I emailed the company to ask if there was any way to improve it, but I haven't heard back (not surprised given that is a $29 item).  I returned it and bought this one from Channel Plus, which works great [...]

Reviews.Title: Great option for easy video distribution
Reviews.Author: BlueBass
Reviews.Content: I recently bought two security cameras and wanted a way to view them on several TVs throughout my house.  I bought two of these modulators, one for each camera.  Using a regular coaxial splitter/combiner, I was able to combine the output from these two UHF modulators, plus my over-the-air HDTV antenna, and distribute the signals to 3 HDTVs and one SDTV with no problem.  I can now view all my over-the-air channels PLUS tune in my security cameras, all from any TV!I previously purchased two Belkin RF Modulator (F8V3063), but they were limited to VHF channel 3/4.  When trying to run two of them together (one on CH 3, the other on CH 4), they interfere with each other and the picture quality is horrible.  I returned them and picked up the Nyrius modulators instead.  A tad bit more expensive, but well worth it for the flexibility.Using the Nyrius modulators, I can run one on CH 55 and the other on CH 66 and there is no interference between them.  Problem solved!

Reviews.Title: Item does NOT work as specified
Reviews.Author: Paul
Reviews.Content: I purchased this item to link my home video surveillance system to my home tv's via the central cable input for the house located in the server closet.  This item does NOT produce a clear visable picture using the feed from the surveillance system.  To test the feed, I isolated the output from the video system and hooked it directly to a nearby TV's input and determined the surviellance systemn puts out a very good clear picture.  I then tested the device by hooking the input of the device to my HiDef video camera and then played a video through the device into the TV on chanel 120, the picture was extremely poor.  So I have isolated the problem to this RF device.  I will now try to return it and seek advice on a new better device.I wish to point out I hired professionals to install the surveillance system including this device.  I performed the preceeding tests on their direction.

Reviews.Title: No me funcionó
Reviews.Author: ADRIAN BERMUDEZ ESTRADA
Reviews.Content: En las especificaciones indicaba que servía para incluir un equipo de seguridad de cámaras en mi red de TV, cuando se instaló no funcionó tuve que comprar uno de otra marca

Reviews.Title: Nyrius NRFM100
Reviews.Author: Jerry Rasmussen
Reviews.Content: This product did not meet my needs.  I was trying to get it to send my DirecTV signal to another TV but it did not work.

Reviews.Title: Tv analog to digital
Reviews.Author: Bill Austin
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a product that I could use to convert my old VHS tapes to DVD recordings. This device met all my needs.  Price, value, and easy to operate.  My order was received as expected in a timely and as advertised.

Reviews.Title: Product did not do what I expected
Reviews.Author: Ray
Reviews.Content: This product did not do what I expected, would not work with my Direct TV HD sat. receiver. I sent the product back.

Reviews.Title: Don't Buy!  Doesn't Work
Reviews.Author: Roger Killingsworth
Reviews.Content: Installed it per instructions (what there were of them).  Couldn't receive its air signal in another room 40' away through 3 walls.  Couldn't receive its air signal in the same room 8' away with no walls in between.  I'd return it for a refund except it would cost more than the purchase price.  I've done a lot of business with Amazon.  Nearly all transactions have been excellent.  This is only the second bummer.

Reviews.Title: Caution
Reviews.Author: Orlando2010
Reviews.Content: This only has RF as output, there is no RCA output! The description at website is not clear at all.

ProductInfo.Features:
Broadcast any audio/video device on multiple TVs
Set to any available UHF channels 14-69 or CATV channels 64-94 & 100-125
Ability to use higher channels to avoid interfering with your favorite channels
Watch movie channel on any TV in your home, broadcast big game or music channel to multiple TVs at your bar or club, view quad screen on your CCTV camera DVR system at your business
Converts RCA composite audio/video input connection into a coaxial output
ProductInfo.Name: Nyrius NRFM100 Universal Channel RF Signal Modulator Audio/Video Converter with UHF/CATV Mode for satellite/cable TV set-top-box, DVD, surveillance camera
